programme.title: טורבו (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. טורבו הוא חילזון קטן החולם לנצח במירוץ "אינדי 500". תאונה מוזרה הופכת אותו למהיר, והוא יוצא למסע יוצא דופן על מנת להגשים את הבלתי אפשרי... דיבוב עברית: עידו מוסרי. במאי: דיוויד סורן. 2013. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מפרץ ההרפתקאות: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. ריידר וכלבי יחידת החילוץ נקראים לעיר ההרפתקאות על מנת לנסות ולהציל אותה מראש העיר המדינגר, המשחק בצורה מסוכנת עם מזג האוויר בעיר וגרם להרס וחורבן. דיבוב עב': שיר כהן. במאי: קאל ברונקר. 2021. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מסביב לעולם ב-80 יום (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות בעיבוד מחודש לקלאסיקה של ז'ול וורן. קופיף צעיר ומלומד יוצא להרפתקה פראית מסביב לעולם ב-80 יום, לאחר שקיבל אתגר מצפרדע כריזמטי וחד לשון. דיבוב: יולי סקר, גילן שחף. במאי: סמואל תורנו. צרפת, 2021.

programme.title: הקרודים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. משפחת הקרודים הקדמונית תמיד נשארה במערה הבטוחה שלה. לאחר שהמערה נהרסת, הקרודים נחשפים לראשונה לנוף מרהיב ועולם חדש ומופלא. קולות: דקלה הדר, לירון לב, רבקה מיכאלי. במאים: קירק דה-מיקו, כריס סנדרס. 2013. כ' עב'.

programme.title: גנוב על החיים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הסרט הרביעי בסדרת סרטי האנימציה המצליחה. גרו ומשפחתו מקבלים למשפחה חבר חדש: גרו ג'וניור, שמתעקש לענות את אביו שרק רוצה קצת אהבה מבנו התינוק. במקביל אויב חדש-ישן מאיים על כל המשפחה. דיבוב: יניב ביטון, ליאת הר לב. 2024.

programme.title: לשיר (מדובב)
programme.desc: להיט אנימציה מוזיקלי. בעיר של חיות אנושיות, במטרה להציל את התאטרון שלו מפני סגירה, מארגן דב קואלה שאפתן תחרות שירה שתזכה את המנצח בפרס ענק. דיבוב: צביקה הדר, במאי: גארת ג'נינגס, כריסטוף לורדלה. ארה"ב, 2016. כ' עב'.

programme.title: חברים דמיוניים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. ילדה צעירה מגלה כי יש לה יכולת מופלאה - לראות במציאות את החברים הדמיוניים של ילדים אחרים. כעת היא מנסה לאחד בין החברים הדמיוניים לילדים, אשר ננטשו עם השנים. עם: ריאן ריינולדס. דיבוב עב': רון לוי. 2024.

programme.title: מאווקה נסיכת היער (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. מאווקה היא נסיכה ביער קסום ותפקידה לשמור עליו ועל הטבע. כאשר בן אנוש ומוסיקאי מוכשר מופיע, ניצוצות האהבה עפים ומאווקה חייבת לבחור בין תפקידה כשומרת היער לבין אהבתה לבן האנוש. דיבוב עב': תובל שפיר. 2023.

programme.title: רובוטריקים: ההתחלה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מלאת אקשן, הסרט השמיני בסדרת "רובוטריקים". הסיפור שמעולם לא סופר על כיצד אופטימוס פריים ומגאטרון הפכו למנהיגי הרובוטריקים ואויבים מושבעים. דיבוב עב': אסף פריינטא, תמיר גינזבורג. במאי: ג'וש קולי. 2024.

programme.desc: שידור חוזר: ליגת הפאדל המקצועית, אליפות גואדלחארה, מקסיקו - גמר.

programme.title: פול אימפקט
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: כדורגל. מחזור 16. תיעוד בלעדי של כל הרגעים המרגשים והמפתיעים שאסור לכם לפספס במחזור ה-16 בליגה האיטלקית.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.(n)

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.(n)

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: In 1971, an American military analyst uncovers the depths of the US government's deceptions about the futility of the Vietnam War, and takes action by copying top-secret documents that would become the Pentagon Papers. Washington Post owner Kay Graham and her editor Ben Bradlee discover The New York Times is preparing an explosive expose on those papers and, determined to compete, set out to publish them first. Steven Spielberg's fact-based drama, starring Meryl Streep, Tom Hanks, Sarah Paulson and Bob Odenkirk.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent. As jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: A banker is wrongly jailed for his wife's murder and over the course of a life sentence he forms a close friendship with a fellow inmate. He also earns a position of trust as book-keeper to the corrupt prison governor - but makes an enemy of his benefactor as he tries to clear his name. Frank Darabont's drama, starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown and Gil Bellows.(n)

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: American fashion model-turned-war photographer Lee Miller is determined to document the truth of the Nazi regime, and in spite of the odds stacked against female correspondents, she captures some of the most important images of the Second World War. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Winslet, Andy Samberg, Alexander Skarsgard and Marion Cotillard.(n)

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell.(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.(n)

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent. As jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce.(n)

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: A banker is wrongly jailed for his wife's murder and over the course of a life sentence he forms a close friendship with a fellow inmate. He also earns a position of trust as book-keeper to the corrupt prison governor - but makes an enemy of his benefactor as he tries to clear his name. Frank Darabont's drama, starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown and Gil Bellows.(n)

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: Ice skater Tonya Harding rises through the ranks at the US figure skating championships, but her future in the sport is thrown into question by a shocking incident after her ex-husband steps in. Director Craig Gillespie's comedy biopic, starring Margot Robbie, Sebastian Stan, and Allison Janney, who won a Bafta and an Oscar for her performance.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A single man gets the chance to turn his unhappy life around when his father reveals that they both have the ability to travel through time and change their personal history. He uses his newfound talent to try to improve his love life and win the heart of an American woman he has fallen for. Romantic fantasy comedy, with Domhnall Gleeson, Rachel McAdams and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: A single mother desperate for work pleads her way into a routine administrative job at a law firm. It is not long before she stumbles across mislaid documents about a case brought against a corporation for poisoning the residents of a small town by contaminating their water supply. Realising something is amiss, she begins her own investigation. Fact-based drama, with Julia Roberts in an Oscar-winning role, alongside Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested in the middle of the night by FBI agents wielding automatic weapons. Her players included Hollywood royalty, sports stars, business titans and finally - unbeknownst to her - the Russian Mob. Directed by The West Wing creator Aaron Sorkin, and starring Jessica Chastain, Idris Elba and Kevin Costner.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.

programme.title: May December
programme.desc: Twenty years after their notorious tabloid romance gripped the nation, a married couple buckles under pressure when an actress arrives to do research for a film about their past. Director Todd Haynes' drama, starring Natalie Portman, Chris Tenzis and Julianne Moore.

Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas.

programme.title: It Ends With Us

Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A naive young literature student's life is thrown into turmoil by an affair with a mysterious billionaire. Initially she is intrigued by his aloof and distant manner, but soon realises he is harbouring dark secrets and desires. Erotic drama based on EL James' bestseller, starring Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sadomasochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her. Erotic drama sequel to Fifty Shades of Grey, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan, Eric Johnson, Bella Heathcote and Rita Ora.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: As tycoon Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia revel in a life of luxury, their happiness is endangered by her former boss. Conclusion of the romantic thriller trilogy based on EL James' novel, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan and Eric Johnson.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: A former professional basketball player agrees to coach a high-school team, but he is unimpressed by its lack of discipline and instigates a tough new regimen. All goes well until the youngsters start to become complacent, forcing him to take drastic action - which leads to a backlash of complaints from angry parents and pupils alike. Drama, with Samuel L Jackson, Ashanti, Rob Brown and Robert Ri'chard.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: A radio DJ contemplates suicide after a listener embarks on a murderous rampage in response to one of his broadcasts. He is saved by a now-homeless former professor of medieval history, who encourages him to retrieve what he claims is the Holy Grail. When the DJ later learns that he is responsible for his saviour's misfortunes, he feels compelled to make amends. Terry Gilliam's comedy drama, with Robin Williams, Jeff Bridges, Amanda Plummer and Mercedes Ruehl.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: American fashion model-turned-war photographer Lee Miller is determined to document the truth of the Nazi regime, and in spite of the odds stacked against female correspondents, she captures some of the most important images of the Second World War. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Winslet, Andy Samberg, Alexander Skarsgard and Marion Cotillard.

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: Three former opera singers prepare for their annual concert to mark Verdi's birthday and raise funds for their retirement home. However, this year, a famous diva has joined the group, and her history with the others threatens the performance. Comedy drama, directed by Dustin Hoffman and starring Maggie Smith, Billy Connolly, Tom Courtenay, Pauline Collins and Michael Gambon.

Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent. As jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce.

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A grizzled drifter rescues a nun from a gang of rapists and gets roped into escorting her across the Mexican desert. He gradually realises there is more to his new companion than meets the eye - and she may be hiding a surprising secret. Don Siegel's Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Shirley MacLaine, Manolo Fabregas, Alberto Morin and John Kelly.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.

programme.title: May December
programme.desc: Twenty years after their notorious tabloid romance gripped the nation, a married couple buckles under pressure when an actress arrives to do research for a film about their past. Director Todd Haynes' drama, starring Natalie Portman, Chris Tenzis and Julianne Moore.

Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: A middle-class family take in a hulking homeless teenager, who has no education or skills to speak of. The indomitable wife encourages him to turn his life around, helping him to get the grades he needs for a college scholarship and hone his sporting skills to become an American football player. Fact-based drama, starring an Oscar-winning Sandra Bullock alongside Quinton Aaron and Tim McGraw.

programme.title: Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Anthology of stories charting the romantic complications of various Los Angeles residents. A businessman and a soldier on leave share a flight home, a teacher is smitten with a doctor and an elderly couple comfort their lovesick grandson. Romantic comedy drama, with Ashton Kutcher, Jessica Alba, Jamie Foxx, Jennifer Garner and Julia Roberts.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: American zoologist Dian Fossey gives up her comfortable city life to research endangered mountain gorillas in Rwanda. Living among the apes, she develops a close bond with the animals and becomes an expert in how they communicate, while dedicating the rest of her life to protecting gorillas from extinction. Fact-based drama, starring Sigourney Weaver, Bryan Brown, Julie Harris and Iain Cuthbertson.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper. On his return to the US following four tours of duty in Iraq, he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father far more difficult to deal with than the demands of warfare. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner.(n)

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.(n)

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.(n)

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: In the summer of 1939, influential families in Nazi Germany send their daughters to a finishing school in an English seaside town to learn the language and be ambassadors for Hitler. A teacher sees what is coming and tries to raise the alarm, but the authorities believe he is the problem. Thriller, starring Judi Dench, James D'Arcy, Jim Broadbent and Eddie Izzard.(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with HIV and given 30 days to live discovers that many treatments for his condition are not available in the US. With the aid of a transsexual Aids patient, he sets up a scheme to smuggle the drugs into the country and distribute them to those in need. Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: A Good Person
programme.desc: Allison is a young woman whose world falls apart when she survives an unimaginable tragedy. While in recovery for an opioid addiction and unresolved grief, she forms an unlikely friendship with her would-be father-in-law, Daniel, that gives her a fighting chance to put her life back together. Writer/director Zach Braff's drama, starring Florence Pugh and Morgan Freeman.(n)

programme.title: Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Anthology of stories charting the romantic complications of various Los Angeles residents. A businessman and a soldier on leave share a flight home, a teacher is smitten with a doctor and an elderly couple comfort their lovesick grandson. Romantic comedy drama, with Ashton Kutcher, Jessica Alba, Jamie Foxx, Jennifer Garner and Julia Roberts.(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: A single mother desperate for work pleads her way into a routine administrative job at a law firm. It is not long before she stumbles across mislaid documents about a case brought against a corporation for poisoning the residents of a small town by contaminating their water supply. Realising something is amiss, she begins her own investigation. Fact-based drama, with Julia Roberts in an Oscar-winning role, alongside Albert Finney and Aaron Eckhart.(n)

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.(n)

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbet's drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn.(n)

programme.title: The Cinema List: Black British Actors
programme.desc: A look at the work of some exceptionally talented Black British actors, from Naomie Harris to Idris Elba and beyond.(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: A gay man makes a deal with his lesbian friend - a green-card marriage for him, in exchange for in vitro fertilisation treatments for her. Romantic comedy, starring Bowen Yang, Lily Gladstone and Kelly Marie Tran.(n)

programme.title: Hallow Road
programme.desc: Two parents are thrust into a desperate race against time after a late-night call from their daughter reveals she caused a devastating car accident. Director Babak Anvari's psychological thriller, starring Rosamund Pike and Matthew Rhys.(n)

programme.title: A Make or Break Holiday
programme.desc: A couple on the brink of separation agrees to pretend they are still together while hosting Christmas for their families. But as they work side by side to pull off the perfect holiday, they rediscover the spark they thought was gone. Romantic drama, starring Jennifer-Juniper Angeli.(n)

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: Washed-up Hollywood action hero Bradley Mack takes a role in a small English village's quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the show's straight-talking dance instructor. Festive family comedy, starring Kiefer Sutherland, Rebel Wilson, Alice Eve and Danny Dyer.(n)

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: Kung fu prodigy Li Fong moves to New York City with his mother and befriends his classmate, Mia. But Connor Day, a local karate champion, provokes Li and publicly humiliates him. Li seeks guidance from his mentor, the kung fu master Mr Han, who reaches out to Daniel LaRusso, convincing the original Karate Kid to teach Li the principles of Miyagi Karate. Drama sequel, starring Jackie Chan, Ben Wang and Ralph Macchio.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is in exile with both halves of the 3D cruciform key that can unlock the source code of rogue AI creation, the Entity. Hunt returns to London to reunite with Luther Stickell, Benji Dunn and former thief Grace. The Entity's human henchman, Gabriel, is still on the loose, so Hunt bolsters his ranks with vengeful French assassin Paris and US intelligence agent Theo Degas. Action thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell, Ving Rhames, Simon Pegg and Esai Morales.(n)

programme.title: Tinsel Town

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite for Christmas in the French Alps, reminiscing their grandfather's first trip. They cherish sisterhood and romance with their guide, Frederic. Romantic comedy drama, starring Ashley Williams and Laci J Mailey.(n)

programme.title: A Minecraft Movie

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: A gay man makes a deal with his lesbian friend - a green-card marriage for him, in exchange for in vitro fertilisation treatments for her. Romantic comedy, starring Bowen Yang, Lily Gladstone and Kelly Marie Tran.

programme.title: Sweethearts
programme.desc: Two college freshmen break up with their high school sweethearts during one chaotic night before Thanksgiving. Comedy, starring Kiernan Shipka, Nico Hiraga, Christine Taylor and Jason Babinsky.

programme.title: She's Making a List
programme.desc: A Christmas inspector whose job it is to decide whether children have been naughty or nice fall for the widowed father of the girl she's supposed to evaluate. Before she knows it, her job - and her heart - are on the line. Romantic comedy, starring Lacey Chabert and Alessandro Miro.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A half-human canine is sworn to protect and serve as he faces feline supervillain Petey the Cat. Animated comedy, with the voices of Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery and Isla Fisher.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Penniless Charlie Bucket is one of five lucky children who find a golden ticket in a chocolate bar, winning a once-in-a-lifetime tour of eccentric recluse Willy Wonka's magical sweet company. Unfortunately, the other winners each face a grim fate when they start to misbehave. Tim Burton's children's fantasy, based on Roald Dahl's novel, starring Johnny Depp, Freddie Highmore, Helena Bonham Carter,

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her son's science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Hugh Grant, Leo Woodall and Colin Firth.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: Green-skinned Elphaba Thropp becomes part of the new intake at Shiz University, and shares a room with fellow spell-caster Galinda Upland. It's the beginning of a friendship which culminates in an epic showdown as Elphaba transforms a renegade witch with a skill for bursting into show-stopping songs, like Defying Gravity. Part one of The Wizard of Oz prequel based on the hit stage musical, starrin

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Diabolical nemesis Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina target Anti-Villain League agent Gru, girlfriend Lucy, their girls Margo, Edith and Agnes and new addition Gru Jr. The family goes on the run while the Minions invade AVL HQ. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell and Will Ferrell.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: Washed-up Hollywood action hero Bradley Mack takes a role in a small English village's quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the show's straight-talking dance instructor. Festive family comedy, starring Kiefer Sutherland, Rebel Wilson, Alice Eve and Danny Dyer.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her son's science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Hugh Grant, Leo Woodall and Colin Firth.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory

Unfortunately, the other winners each face a grim fate when they start to misbehave. Tim Burton's children's fantasy, based on Roald Dahl's novel, starring Johnny Depp, Freddie Highmore, Helena Bonham Carter,

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When a young girl is sent to live with her uncle on his remote country estate after her parents die, she discovers a magical garden. Director Marc Munden's adaptation of the classic Frances Hodgson Burnett tale, starring Colin Firth, Julie Walters and Dixie Egerickx.

programme.title: She's Making a List
programme.desc: A Christmas inspector whose job it is to decide whether children have been naughty or nice fall for the widowed father of the girl she's supposed to evaluate. Before she knows it, her job - and her heart - are on the line. Romantic comedy, starring Lacey Chabert and Alessandro Miro.

programme.title: Chuck Chuck Baby
programme.desc: Helen lives with her ex-husband, his 20-year-old girlfriend, their new baby, and his dying mother Gwen. Helen's life is a grind, but she has a chance at romance when a secret love returns. Writer/director Janis Pugh's drama, starring Louise Brealey and Annabel Scholey.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
Bad Boys: Ride Or Die
programme.desc: Fugitives from the law they swore to protect, Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett run a gauntlet of duplicitous police officers and gun-toting criminals in an attempt to clear their late captain's name. Fourth chapter in the action adventure franchise, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens and Ioan Gruffudd.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
programme.desc: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is in exile with both halves of the 3D cruciform key that can unlock the source code of rogue AI creation, the Entity. Hunt returns to London to reunite with Luther Stickell, Benji Dunn and former thief Grace. Terror soon strikes when one child sneaks into a forbidden room and finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: Annabelle Comes Home
programme.desc: Determined to keep Annabelle from wreaking more havoc, paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren lock the possessed doll in the artifacts room in their house. But when the doll awakens the room's evil spirits, it soon becomes an unholy night of terror for the couple's 10-year-old daughter, her friends and their young baby sitter.
